video.title: The Finder
video.synopsis: This offbeat detective drama stars Geoff Stults as an Army veteran whose rare talent for finding people makes him vital to criminal investigations.

episodes.synopsis: Walter helps a boy find his father, a military pilot who disappeared during a secret mission. Meanwhile, Leo keeps an eye on troublesome teen Willa.
episodes.title: An Orphan Walks into a Bar

episodes.synopsis: Just days before a convicted cop-killer's execution, a former prison official asks Walter to locate evidence that could prove the man's innocence.
episodes.title: Bullets

episodes.synopsis: Walter agrees to help a geeky NASA engineer find a beautiful woman he met in a bar, but his only lead is a single red shoe the woman left behind.
episodes.title: A Cinderella Story

episodes.synopsis: When Isabel's new beau, a gifted baseball player, is robbed, Walter braves the seedy sports-gambling underworld to get the all-star's belongings back.
episodes.title: Swing and a Miss

episodes.synopsis: While searching for a magician's assistant who actually went missing during a vanishing act, Walter uncovers a plot involving counterfeit currency.
episodes.title: The Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: Walter runs headlong into shadowy government interference when he starts investigating an astronaut's claims to have seen a UFO.
episodes.title: Little Green Men

episodes.synopsis: A girl goes missing just as a hurricane slams into Florida, forcing Walter to search for her without leaving Leo's boarded-up bar.
episodes.title: Eye of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: Hired to discover who illegally released never-before-heard tracks from a long-dead rapper, Walter discovers new evidence about the artist's murder.
episodes.title: Life After Death

episodes.synopsis: Walter's search for a noted chef leads into some unexpectedly dangerous territory. Meanwhile, a fight lands Willa back in jail.
episodes.title: The Last Meal

episodes.synopsis: Both Walter and a gorgeous FBI agent try to track down a missing oil rig worker whose gangland past might have caught up with him.
episodes.title: The Conversation

episodes.synopsis: Searching for the money a murdered compulsive gambler left to his daughter, Walter follows the trail to a racetrack where the fix seems to be in.
episodes.title: The Inheritance

episodes.synopsis: Stymied in his hunt for a voodoo doll that a superstitious crime boss hired him to find, Walter reluctantly turns to a self-described witch for help.
episodes.title: The Voodoo Undo

episodes.synopsis: Walter's dying father asks him to locate his ex-wife, Walter's mother, who left years ago and is now in a witness protection program.
episodes.title: The Boy with the Bucket
